mapper.select: select po.post_id , count(po.post_id) as post_count , ca.category_name , (select count(*) from file_info fi where fi.post_id = po.post_id) as file_count , po.title , po.post_content , po.writer , po.write_dt , po.update_dt from post_info po inner join category_info ca on (po.category_id = ca.category_id) where po.post_id = #{postId}
